name: Maniac Inc.
description:
Classic defend the castle game with lots of fun store items and weapons! 

-- Hi, I'm Bob. 
People call me a maniac. 
I've gotten used to it. In fact I've even named my company after it. 
Oh, what do I do? 
I wipe out the human race for a living. It's actually really rewarding work. 
I guess mass destruction always came naturally for me. I'm kind of an introvert and I just don't like people, you see. 
In fact I haven't been outside... Like ever. 
I like my room though. It's so nice and comfortable. 
If only people would leave me alone... They always have to come BUGGING ME while I'm working! 
CAN'T YOU SEE THAT I'M BUSY?! 
LEAVE. 
ME. 
ALONE. -- 

Tools: 

  • Unity 5.5 (C#) 
  • Visual Studio 
  • Photoshop CC 
  • Adobe Audition
